CustomField.description: When the Lookup Field On Lookup Object is a hierarchy/self-referential lookup field (looks up to the same object as the Lookup Object), check this box to roll all the way up to the ultimate parent in the hierarchy.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the Lookup Field On Lookup Object is a hierarchy/self-referential lookup field (looks up to the same object as the Lookup Object), check this box to roll all the way up to the ultimate parent in the hierarchy.
CustomField.label: Rollup To Ultimate Parent
